response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its value and the effort put into its development, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for a special introductory price of $8,500. This offer is designed to provide you with a significant savings while ensuring you receive the highest quality product available. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of serving you with our exceptional product.", "product_price": 8500}
